metadata.inclusion:
1. Touch any key on the device.
2. LEDs will flash yellow 3 times and all outputs will switch on when successfully included.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press and hold the top left button for at least 8 seconds.
2. LED will flash red 3 times and sound a tone when successfully excluded.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the unit from the wall mounting box.
2. Press and hold the hidden factory reset button for at least 3 seconds.
3. LED will flash red 3 times and sound a tone when reset is complete.
